snippets: Driving MRR growth through strategic upselling and new market penetration.
Optimizing CAC by refining digital marketing channels and improving conversion rates.
Maintaining a healthy LTV:CAC ratio above 3:1 to ensure sustainable growth.
Reducing monthly churn below 2% with proactive customer success initiatives.
Boosting user engagement and product stickiness to increase Daily Active Users.
Achieving a Net Promoter Score of 50+ to reflect strong customer loyalty.
Sustaining high gross margins through scalable cloud infrastructure.
Focusing on product innovation to enhance user value and drive long-term retention.
